channel.title: CVE Feed for joelcj91 -- 404 to 301 – Redirect, Log and Notify 404 Errors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for joelcj91 -- 404 to 301 – Redirect, Log and Notify 404 Errors

item.title: CVE-2021-4338|2024-08-03T17:23:10.745Z -- joelcj91 -- 404%20to%20301%20%E2%80%93%20redirect%2C%20log%20and%20notify%20404%20errors
item.description: The 404 to 301 plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to missing capability checks on the open_redirect & save_redirect functions in versions up to, and including, 3.0.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to view, create and edit redirections.
